website_summaries.verdict: A top choice with unbeatable features: bottle space, user-friendly design, quality construction. The best on the market.
pros: Simplistic, space-saving design is both sturdy and attractive
Labels on displayed bottles are easy to read
cons: It's at the higher end of the price range, but it offers a lot for the money

customer_reviews.title: Great wine rack
customer_reviews.text: Arrived earlier than originally promised delivery date and in flawless condition. Packaging was overdone if anything -- there were both an outer and inner box and the frame and all shelves were individually bubble wrapped. Setup is easy and requires no tools, and it should be easy to break down for moving or storage. Nice, unobtrusive design. Shelves are just wide enough for magnum bottles or Champagne. Overall a great choice for a small wine collection.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Peck

customer_reviews.title: this is NOT best of the best
customer_reviews.text: this thing is garbage. Welds broke, and now rickety and out of square. This is the problem with amazon.. looks good in the pic... bought this in April with a 1 month return window(that I was unaware of). You cant tell in a month this thing is going to fall apart, although it came with a few broken welds. I feel taken advantage of. This was NOT an inexpensive purchase but when I first had it put together, I knew it was going to be trouble. I am very unhappy with the AMAZON experience lately. Broken items, items that never arrive, return inconvienience. I cant return this now and feel ive been taken for $100 or more.
customer_reviews.author: john gaetano

customer_reviews.title: Great Wine Rack & Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this rack, so well made, easy to assemble, sturdy, fits larger size bottles of wine. The packaging is no longer an issue as discussed in earlier reviews, the seller told me they improved on it and I have to say it is bullet prof, double boxed in heavy duty cartons with some added card board protectors, I an not believe they can include the shipping at the price they charge. It arrived quickly and I could not be happier, I highly recommend this
customer_reviews.author: filtergal

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Constructed.
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping that other negative reviewers just had a bad experience, but apparently I'm one of those. The rack "seems" sturdy enough, but the issue is that nothing is square. Just trying to open the two sides was difficult because of the sloppy work. Additionally the top shelf was so out of square I couldn't even put it in the rack. This one shelf was so curved (yet in no way could have been damaged in shipping) that there's no way the packer wouldn't see that it wasn't square. Poor quality control I wouldn't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sean M. Ballhorn

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Utilitarian Solution for Storing Your Wine
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Neatly accommodates most standard (750 ml) bottles of various shapes, to include wide based pinot noir. - Ridiculously easy to set up - Designed to hold 54 bottles, though i have successfully and safely stored as many as 59 (by stacking 5 additional bottles on top of those on the top shelf) - Sturdy and stable Cons: - Expensive - Perfect for under bars or in wine closets etc., but a bit industrial looking for open storage
customer_reviews.author: TomP

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality resulted in bottle crashing to the floor
customer_reviews.text: The wine rack was easy to set up and we were initially happy with our purchase. A few month later we go into the room the wine rack is in to find that one of the hooks holding a shelf up had broken loose at the welding and the four wine bottles we had on that rack had crashed onto our tile floor. Two of the bottles broke open releasing red wine all over the tile and grout. The grout is now stained. We are still using the other shelves but do not trust it to hold more than 3 bottles on a shelf vs the 6 it is designed to hold. I would not recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: THarris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Wine Rack
customer_reviews.text: Wine rack is excellent for the price and it took less than two minutes to set up. Literally open the sides, drop the shelves and add the top two rows. It's a simple metal design, so if you are looking for something fancy with a wow factor this isn't your wine rack. That said, I am very happy with this, it's functional and sturdy with a simple design. Rack holds nearly all bottle types including pinot noir. I have one bottle that is slimmer and longer than standard bottles and it sticks out a bit, otherwise all my bottles sit nestled in the sections. I have two rows full or pinot noir bottles and no issues with fit. Excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Wright

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned the rock might sag under the weight of the bottles but it was not an issue. The metal is solid and my welds are good. My only issue is that one of feet, where the unit contacts the floor had broken. It was easily fixed however. So I say five stars. I can move the rack when it about half full. Anymore than that, then it will be wobbly and unwieldy. Very sturdy...I was prepared to bolt into the wall but no need.
customer_reviews.author: Clean Freak

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any size wine or champagne bottle
customer_reviews.text: Love this wine and champagne stand. Easy to assemble, just pull it out of the box, open the sides and pull up the shelves. It's nice looking and sturdy. Champagne bottles fit easily on the shelves. Which was important since many wine holders do not allow enough room for this size bottles. You can also fit cordial bottles so they don't slide thru the shelves. Like this so much I ordered another one.
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: ordered one rack it was perfect,, I reordered a week later the price ...
customer_reviews.text: ordered one rack it was perfect,, I reordered a week later the price had gone up, the box was full of loose gunpowder, and one of the wine racks at the very top wasnt welded properly so I can not fit a bottle into that slot, other than that, its a good product,, I am not sure about the loose gunpowder in the box,, I cleaned the box out and set the gunpowder on fire to make sure that in fact was gunpowder
customer_reviews.author: Bryce D.

customer_reviews.title: Great wine rack!
customer_reviews.text: Love this wine rack! I have three Of them for my cellar, but they would look great in any room, and takes all sizes of bottles, including Champagnes. No assembly! I searched for ages for all-bottle size accommodation with little to no assembly and hit the jackpot with this find.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: One of the TACK welded hooks that support the front of the shelves was broken off making one shelf useless. We can't trust it at all now - it must go back! Would not recommend this rack - it is rather flimsy and TACK welding on the supporting metal parts seems inappropriate for the shelf loads. Great concept - poor execution!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: I love this wine rack even more now that when I ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this wine rack even more now that when I first saw it on line. It is sleek and nice looking and is so easy to fold together or fold down. Really cleaned up my wine bottles being in several places and enough that I could organize them like never before (lightest on top to heaviest on the bottom) which makes for easy location as well. This is the nocest wine rack I have found.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great rack for portability and price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the flexibility of folding this up to put away and easy to move. This unit meets my needs. The top two shelves come detached and the others fold up. One detached shelf has a slight bend, perhaps from shipping. So, durability is not a strong characteristic of this design, but it is a reasonable trade off for portability and price.
customer_reviews.author: CYR

customer_reviews.title: Great wine rack, but poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up...much better than similar products which require assembly. The only problem was that three of the four leveling feet were missing.
customer_reviews.author: John A. Fiedler

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: One of the 4 legs bent within a couple of weeks, while the wine rack was 1/4 full. Very low quality, don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Andrea V

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up, perfect for wine collectors!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bigger wine rack and needed space to put my larger riedel glasses (wouldn’t fit in my cabinets). Looks great and took ten minutes to unbox, set up the shelves and drill in the top panel.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about this stand but I'm incredibly happy I got it. Super easy to standup and very sturdy. I would definitely recommend this if you are looking to expand or purchase your first rack!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Hightree

customer_reviews.title: Good value for price and fits a lot of bottles
customer_reviews.text: Fit nicely into our space and accommodated our medium wine collection. Easy to assemble, although now instructions were included.
customer_reviews.author: A. Socarras

customer_reviews.title: Stands up to a full load of wine
customer_reviews.text: It looks kind of ho-hum, but it holds a lot of wine with no problem. It's sturdier than it looks, so far no problems with bending or sagging.
customer_reviews.author: Pan's Oak

customer_reviews.title: Wine rack
customer_reviews.text: I am totally happy with our wine rack. Minor glitch...first one arrived without one of the adjustable leg pieces but company very quickly sent a replacement without us having to worry about sending abck the defective piece. Very happy with customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Helen Bartelsmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and was simple to put together
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and was simple to put together. The longer European wine bottles don't fit perfectly (reason for four star rating) but they don't last too long either
customer_reviews.author: Swiss Miss

customer_reviews.title: Very simple and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I especially like that the feet are adjustable as a result of using screw in feet.
customer_reviews.author: John R Fulmer

customer_reviews.title: NIce rack for the money.
customer_reviews.text: The rack arrived with one leg slightly bent. I was able to easily straighten it. The rack is fairly easy to assemble - mostly just unfolding the shelves onto the hooks. Rack is sturdy and the spacing between rows allows you to store more bottles in less space but still be able to see the labels fairly easily. Bottles tend to settle into the rack and can take a just a little effort to lift out. Overall, I'm satisfied with this rack and may buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Wine rack arrived today. It took longer to unwrap than to set up. It seems sturdy. Assembly consisted of screwing feet into the bottom of the rack. It holds 54 bottles of wine securely. I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: It didn't meet my expectations as far as weight / ...
customer_reviews.text: It didn't meet my expectations as far as weight / quality (the metal is actually hollow and more lightweight than anticipated). That being said, it does the job quite well and I am still giving it a 4 star.
customer_reviews.author: B Extra

customer_reviews.title: Nice Rack
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble once you figure out how to align the shelves. Once unpacked you will have a lot of paint dust so there will be some cleanup. Unpack, Install and setup took about 10 mins.
customer_reviews.author: greekcritic

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: This is very study and looks nice. Fits a lot of bottles in a small space. It folds up for shipping so it’s easy to put together. Just unfold it. No tools needed. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Adam W

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product
customer_reviews.text: I love my wine rack easily to put together and very stable. If I had more space I would order another one.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia. A

customer_reviews.title: Great wine rack
customer_reviews.text: This was great. I searched high and low for a wine rack and this was everything I was looking for and at a very reasonable cost.
customer_reviews.author: J. Deleonardo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Holds a lot and fits in my (large) pantry. I appreciated not having to assemble something for a change.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome rack except the frame was a little bit bent on top.
customer_reviews.text: As said in the headline. If the frame was bent a little bit more, it would have been impossible to open the frame to make it into a rack.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Chen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fairly study once it is in place. Works well with all size and type of bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Cincy Book-diva

customer_reviews.title: I joined a wine club and this is my display ...
customer_reviews.text: I joined a wine club and this is my display rack. I have a 100 bottles of wine cause of the darn club. Considering dating a woman who loves wine so I don't have to buy another.
customer_reviews.author: D. Kuhl

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this three times. The first time, it was as described. The last two times, the legs have been bent. The packaging these come in is absolutely useless. DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.author: Alec Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Great unit. Exactly what I needed as I had ...
customer_reviews.text: Great unit. Exactly what I needed as I had run out of space for my wine. It was very easy to put together and yet sturdy once together. We sacrificed the top rack by putting a piece of tempered glass over it and it sits next to our bar as an extension of it.
customer_reviews.author: david lawson blake

customer_reviews.title: This wine rack would be perfect if all the feet screwed in properly
customer_reviews.text: This wine rack would be perfect if all the feet screwed in properly. Only three went in right. The 4th one won't catch the threading. Now I have to pack this thing up and return it. Beyond frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outside the box
customer_reviews.text: This would make a great wine rack! But I am using it for a laptop rack! There’s room on each shelf for a laptop and a small container for cords, extra equipment, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Great for small spaces. I love that it is collapsible. (It is sturdy while in use)
customer_reviews.author: Sandy A

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: REally easy to assemble and use - fits all my bottles. Perfect for my space. I'll be ordering another.
customer_reviews.author: LAlex2015

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and efficient.
customer_reviews.text: Simple and does the job. Easy to assemble and does not take up a lot of space. I did not want the wine rack to be a focal point and this rack does that.
customer_reviews.author: Lucinda J. Knebel

customer_reviews.title: Missing items
customer_reviews.text: We are missing items to build the rack. The two legs on the bottom did not come with the package. Are you able to resend me the parts?
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Sturchio

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This rack is attractive, sturdy, and easy to assemble. Its size is compact, yet stores a good number of bottles. Just what we needed for our wine club purchases!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah K. Protzman

customer_reviews.title: Foldable wine rack
customer_reviews.text: This wine storage rack met my requirements perfectly. It is compact, sturdy, and can be easily be folded for storage. The rack arrived in perfect condition and was very easily set up for use...no tools or assistance required.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. I don't understand the many good reviews ...
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. I don't understand the many good reviews of this wine rack. It is of poor quality and looks the part. The feet are crooked and break easily. You can find much better options for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and sturdy, this certainly met my needs
customer_reviews.text: Attractive and sturdy, this certainly met my needs. I had it full within two weeks of getting it, so maybe not such a good thing!
customer_reviews.author: CincyFan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this rack to go in a hall closet and it fits perfect, also very sturdy. I took a star off because it came in damaged. One of the support feet was bent in shipping. It doesn't make the rack sit uneven or I would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Mistifi13

customer_reviews.title: Bent rack was sent
customer_reviews.text: The upper piece of the wine rack came dented. There really wasn’t a great way of bending it back into place. It was easy to assemble though.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Moya

customer_reviews.title: These racks are perfect! I purchased two of them and they hold ...
customer_reviews.text: These racks are perfect! I purchased two of them and they hold the bottles very securely. Because of the rails on both sides of the bottle, the bottles can't slip forward like they can in some racks. I also really like that it is sturdy and collapsible. Perfect for easily moving in the future.
customer_reviews.author: undine shoop

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to open, nice heavy weight for stability and looks great in my dining room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value - Chinese quality - get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Simple setup, solid. only problem was a couple of the floor legs were bent. Couldn't be bothered to de-assemble and re-pack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Wine Rack
customer_reviews.text: This wine rack takes up very little space but holds 54 bottles! Easy to put together, too. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A. Coploff

customer_reviews.title: Wine Cooler
customer_reviews.text: My husband joined a wine club, so we needed a place to keep them. Perfect for all our wines!
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and sturdiness characterize well this wine rack.
customer_reviews.text: Could not find something that would make me dislike this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pierre B

customer_reviews.title: Steel wine rack
customer_reviews.text: Great wine rack. Solid metal and easy to assemble. I'd recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: George H. Guenther

customer_reviews.title: Great rack for your wine
customer_reviews.text: Great rack for your wine. Nothing too fancy, but looks nice and is sturdy. Will like buy a few more!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Wigginton

customer_reviews.title: This is such a great find! Awesome price and really clean lines
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great find! Awesome price and really clean lines. There is basically no assembly required which I loved! It’s quite sturdy and seems very well made. I’m thrilled with it!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Watts

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, and high quality! We've already filled it up with wine, and it's done a great job holding the weight of those 54 bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni D

customer_reviews.title: Fairly sturdy rack that does what it says
customer_reviews.text: Fairly sturdy rack that does what it says. Holds bottles securely and as long as it is beside a wall, I feel confident I won't lose my wine and stain my floor.
customer_reviews.author: TRG

customer_reviews.title: Solid Wine Rack
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and convenient. I like how the top two racks can be removed to allow larger champagne bottle to be placed in the rack.
customer_reviews.author: K. Leitinger

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for Wine Storage and makes so nice and easy ...
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for Wine Storage and makes so nice and easy to see the kind and pick what you are in the mood for!
customer_reviews.author: SoccerMom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect option. The rack is not the focal point, it makes the wine the thing you notice. Holds plenty of the nice wine for special occasions plus room to store alot of the everyday Charles Shaw wine!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is an inexpensive and attractive way to store wine.
customer_reviews.author: C. Culp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy set up, sturdy when loaded and has survived a few knocks from my over exuberant lab.
customer_reviews.author: MR KIERAN DAVID O'KANE

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Sturdy. Package arrived with leg bent.
customer_reviews.author: eva

customer_reviews.title: Great Wine Rack!
customer_reviews.text: Great wine rack! Maximum wine storage capacity for a small area. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Ivette Dorsey

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and very functional
customer_reviews.text: Very quick assembly. Sturdy and very functional. Perfect for our use, and we quickly ordered another.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Dick

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed as came in damaged, and one of the hook was broken. One of the shelf is completely inoperable, and unable to be used - as the hook is broken.
customer_reviews.author: Ashish Parmar

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: This fit perfectly in my pantry! It is sturdy and holds bottles of varying sizes. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Vining

customer_reviews.title: We actually have two and they are perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: One wasn't enough! We actually have two and they are perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Teri G.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy set-up. Holds larger bottles easily and is sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very easy set-up. Holds larger bottles easily and is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Cmk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It looks great and was shipped very promptly. Was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great wine rack
customer_reviews.text: This fit perfectly in our spot looks very nice exactly what we wanted
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: It's a sturdy unit for the price, but one of the metal shelf hooks broke off during assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: It is very sturdy. Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: There was nothing to assemble- just align the shelves and fold down. It is very sturdy. Fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it. fit perfectly where we wanted it to go
customer_reviews.author: LUCI

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The rack is sturdy and very functional at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Gary N Farrell

customer_reviews.title: worth passing on.
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made, not worth the money. I've tried to provide more details but the review gets rejected. so I would say for the money, it's worth passing on this one.
customer_reviews.author: CAVU

customer_reviews.title: Nice rack
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two, one was received damaged and we returned it. We liked them enough to order two more. The second two we received had been repackaged/returned but were undamaged so we kept them. Of the second pair, one was missing the micro cloth and the other had been repackaged with plastic grocery bags. I hope the one we sent back was not returned to stock without an inspection. The rack suit our needs very well, seem sturdy, easy to see the bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Emkay

customer_reviews.title: Poor build quality
customer_reviews.text: We bought this wine rack 2 years ago and loved it. As our collection grew, we decided to order a second. The quality of the second rack is MUCH worse. The welds that hold up the shelves are very cheap, and snapped during assembly. Very different than the higher quality welds on our first unit.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Really nice wine rack
customer_reviews.text: This wine rack assembled in minutes and looks really good. It's a slim, minimalist design and will look good in my guest room/office. I purchased the gray one. The only thing I don't like is the silver feet that screw into the legs. I know something is needed there for leveling and stability, but I might look for replacements that look a little better. Other than that, great purchase. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Pesto Diva

customer_reviews.title: Nice cellar addition
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a supplement to wall mounted metal racks for overflow if and as needed. Great rack with the only regret that the rack is black but the feet are silverish in color. Unboxed quickly and easily, unfolded and setup in seconds, and had wine on the rack a couple minutes later. May purchase another for the other side of the cellar.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed at all.
customer_reviews.text: For over $100, I expected more. The wine rack was poorly packaged. Expect it to be scratched up when it arrives at your house. The tabs that hold the shelves in place will break if you are not careful with them. They have one tack weld that holds them in place. One of mine is broken already. I recommend something else for your money.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Probably nice but shipped without feet
customer_reviews.text: It seems as if this would be a nice wine rack, sturdy and not unattractive. But it was shipped without feet, and without feet the legs are so sharp that even without bottles in it, the feet pierced through the shipping box. Also, it's supposed to unfold but there were no instructions how to unfold it and so far I haven't figured out the trick. If you're putting it on a cement floor maybe the lack of feet wouldn't be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Lofty Becker

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: I often think people who leave negative reviews are looking for reasons to complain. In this case, all the negative reviews are accurate. This item was badly packaged, box and item arrived damaged, and the box was filled with grit that others described as gunpowder. I can’t recommend this product based on the price. For $40, I got something at the local Swedish store that I assembled in 15 minutes without tools. Better quality and much sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Brian G

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Received a defective item, multiple of the shelves wouldn't fit properly due to the brackets they rest on being bent. Now I am stuck dragging it to the UPS Store to return it...
customer_reviews.author: Mike Gleichman

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made - Not straight
customer_reviews.text: The rack was poorly made. The racks are not straight, the welds were awful and they don’t sit flush on the hooks. I can’t believe how bad it is. Will be returning and I will not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Tremayne

customer_reviews.title: I Am Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this wine rack about a month ago. I love the fact that there was nothing to assemble. It seems quite sturdy so at this moment I am very pleased with the look and style of it. This wine rack fits perfectly into my bar area.
customer_reviews.author: Red Rose

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Tilt As Shown In Photo
customer_reviews.text: Luckily our homemade wine bottles were already well sealed and expanded from being on our previous stand as this one does not angle the bottle neck down as shown. For proper storage or corked wine the bottles should be at an angle so that the cork is completely covered by liquid to reduce shrinkage and eventual spoilage due to air exposure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice rack!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect wine rack for our needs. It's good looking, stable and easy to assemble. I was hesitant about getting this wine rack because of past problems with shipping damage and dirt. But more recent reviews said that the rack was better protected for shipping. Our wine arrived with no damage.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a large capacity wine bottle rack. I looked over a lot of them. Should I get wood, should I get metal, Should I get something tall or long? This was the right one for us as I have it in our basement. Easy set up and had all the wine slots filled in 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: kevin miller

customer_reviews.title: Good, though slightly defective
customer_reviews.text: I put mine together in a heartbeat, and like the design, though one of the "arms" that holds up one of the shelves was either bent or not soldered correctly. It leans downward instead of horizontal, so the shelf doesn't sit on it (See image.) I duct taped the shelf bar to the parallel support bar, but I don't trust the build enough to fully load up the whole rack.
customer_reviews.author: Charles F. Burnett

customer_reviews.title: it is very sturdy. Second
customer_reviews.text: First, it is very sturdy. Second, it has a clean look, one I find very appealing. Third, it takes about 5 minutes to assemble. Really, 5 minutes. I couldn't be more enthusiastic in recommending this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Buz from Jersey

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer for traditional wine bottles
customer_reviews.text: Works well for standard sized wine bottles, but 1.75 liquor or old shaped bottled won't fit, underneath, only on top. Sturdy, easy to move or repaint if you don't like the color and certainly organizes your wine collection.
customer_reviews.author: Richard T. Stauffer

customer_reviews.title: Genius
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Box arrived damaged BUT it is so durable nothing was broken. The design is genius
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this wine rack
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this wine rack. So chic and classy. And easy to set up. Perfect design. Everyone should have this product. 5 Stars!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chad Paul Sherman

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Easy to set up. No tools required and is steady.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Dysart

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The rack fits perfectly in my nook. It was easy to assemble, no tools, and easy to move. I recommend this product to anyone who enjoys wine and who doesn't have a whole lot of room for something massive.
customer_reviews.author: KatG

customer_reviews.title: Might be fine if all the parts were there....
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived without the feet, so it is wobbly and unusable. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Saucey Chic

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, LOVE! I was looking for something sturdy and that would fit in a closet. Along with size, ease in which to assemble was also a must. The assembly was basically unfolding all the shelving that was 90% assembled. All I needed to do was put on the feet and start putting my wine. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Joyful

product_meta.title: 54 Bottle Connoisseurs Deluxe Large Foldable Gray Metal Wine Rack Cellar Storage Organizer Display Stand
product_meta.description:
Color:54-bottle, GrayContemporary and sleek space maximizing folding wine rack elegantly holds and displays up to 54 wine bottles in your kitchen or wine cellar. The clever design allows easy assembly (no tools required), and folds flat when not in use. Ideal for use in your wine cellar or any room at home, and makes a perfect Christmas or housewarming gift. 

**Official MyGift product includes multipurpose cleaning towel.**

Approximate Dimensions (in inches): 36 H x 24.75 W x 9.75 D.
feature_bullets: Heavy duty, yet sleekly stylish wine rack elegantly holds and displays up to 54 wine bottles
Clever design allows easy assembly (no tools required), and folds flat when not in use
Makes a perfect Christmas, wedding, or housewarming gift
**Official MyGift product.** Wine bottles not included
SPECS: 36 H x 24.75 W x 9.75 D (in inches)
